attributionInfo.mlsDisclaimer:
The data relating to real estate for sale on this web site comes in part from the Broker Reciprocity Program of GAMLS. All real estate listings are marked with the GAMLS Broker Reciprocity thumbnail logo and detailed information about them includes the name of the listing brokers.
The broker providing these data believes them to be correct, but advises interested parties to confirm them before relying on them in a purchase decision.

Copyright 2023 GAMLS. All rights reserved.

data.description: A Beautiful rare find: The price is right on this lovely 3 Bedroom 2.5 Bath Townhome near Stonecrest Mall, (fine dining & shopping), Arabia Mountain (Nature parks and trails) and the Public Library.  This beautiful Townhome features a cozy large fireplace in the spacious Living Room, eat-in Kitchen with barstool area, soaking tub in the master bath.  Home is all electric and being sold as-is. Will go cash, conventional, FHA & VA.    Close to Interstate 20, Approximately 25 mins to Hartsfield-Jackson Int'l Airport.
